terraform.tfvars.example
files.content:
aws_region   = "us-east-1"
project_name = "fastapi-vault"
environment  = "dev"

# Provide an already-built image URI (ECR recommended)
image_uri = "123456789012.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/fastapi-vault:latest"

# Vault connection (Vault is external to this stack)
vault_addr  = "https://vault.example.com"
vault_token = "REPLACE_ME"

# ACM certificate for your domain in this region
acm_certificate_arn = "arn:aws:acm:us-east-1:123456789012:certificate/xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx"

# Optional Route53 record
# domain_name      = "api.example.com"
# route53_zone_id  = "Z1234567890ABC"
